page.title: 09THE ROMAN ROAD IN ANSTEY 2.
page.content: This week our local newspaper had the headline "{Road may be Roman}". Some children and staff from our school went to see the road. Yesterday another section of this road, thoughtto be the {Via Devanna}, was excavated at Newtwon Linford. There are trees growing near the road and their roots are lifting the top layer off the road. The local historians and archaeologists are hoping to prserve this portion of the{Roman Road} which runs through Anstey. The land however, has been taken over by the Severn Trent Water Authority, Which wants to build an underground reservoir and pumping station on the site. To stop this section of road from being destroyed more evidence is needed that it is{Roman}.
